What I Do

Full Stack Development

Build Web Applications using AngularJS, NodeJS and Gulp task runner.Fetch JSON data with in Orchestration Layer with Spring Boot application and display it in the UI using AngularJS. Performed peer code review for UI and backend code. Perform automation test for the UI screens built in AngularJS using the Protractor framework. Write UI test cases using Jasmine with Karma task runner and maintain high code coverage.

Use sauce labs to test the UI work for browser compatibility on all the common browsers like safari, Firefox, chrome and internet explorer. Use Version One and JIRA tool for the development of Agile-lifecycle management creating the stories, updating the tasks and reporting the bugs. Use GitHub to clone, fetch, merge and push the code.

Where I Work

CapitalOne

Involved in the development of new project of Integrated Commercial Card Experience ICCE. ICCE Application workflow is to track spend and manage the card program, to monitor the balances and transactions, adjust cardholder limits, and make payments.
